EmailTemplate.name: AP Undeliverable – RMRC
EmailTemplate.subject: We have an update on your delivery for case {!Case.CaseNumber}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Australia Post
Case {!Case.CaseNumber}
Hi {!IF(ISBLANK(Contact.Preferred_Name__c),Contact.FirstName,Contact.Preferred_Name__c)},
Your delivery was unable to be completed, please contact the sender for a resolution
Thank you for your patience while we’ve been monitoring your delivery. We now have a tracking update and can recommend some next steps.
We have been unable to deliver your parcel due to an issue with processing the label or address. The parcel will be catalogued into our returned mail redistribution centre (RMRC) for redelivery when we can identify its intended destination. Due to the volume of items in this facility it can take a few weeks to be reviewed and catalogued before being able to forward on your parcel, so please contact the sender regarding the next steps if you want to explore options any sooner; we trust they will be able to provide a way forward for you and they can in turn reach out to claim the parcel from the RMRC. If the sender is unable to assist please allow 10 business days before reaching out via our live chat or help and support portal to check the status and we’d be happy to advise.
Australia Post
